plot: Jang-hwa dies due to the abuse and neglect of her stepmother but the girl returns as a ghost and convinces the local magistrate to seek justice in her name.
title: Dae Jang-hwa Hong-ryeon jeon
plot_es: Jang-hwa dies due to the abuse and neglect of her stepmother but the girl returns as a ghost and convinces the local magistrate to seek justice in her name.
plot_en: Jang-hwa dies due to the abuse and neglect of her stepmother but the girl returns as a ghost and convinces the local magistrate to seek justice in her name.
